trans-unit.source: Represents an open connection to a data source, and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个与数据源的开放连接，并由访问关系数据库的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection> interface enables an inheriting class to implement a Connection class, which represents a unique session with a data source (for example, a network connection to a server).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>接口使继承类实现连接类，它表示与数据源 （例如，网络连接到服务器） 的唯一会话。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Connection classes, see [Connecting to a Data Source](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connecting-to-a-data-source.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关连接类的详细信息，请参阅[连接到数据源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connecting-to-a-data-source.md)。

trans-unit.source: An application does not create an instance of the <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection> interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序不会创建的实例<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>接口直接，但创建继承的类的实例<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection> must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: 继承的类<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>必须实现所有继承的成员，且通常定义其他成员来添加提供程序特定的功能。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection> interface defines the <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>接口定义<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In turn, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> class inherits this property, and also defines the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.PacketSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 反过来，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>类继承此属性，还定义<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.PacketSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates instances of the derived classes, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建的派生类的实例<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is opened and set as the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A> for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>打开并将其设置为<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A>为<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>, and closes the connection.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后调用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>，关闭连接。

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> is passed a connection string and a query string that is a Transact-SQL INSERT statement.
trans-unit.target: 若要实现此目的，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>传递连接字符串和 Transact SQL INSERT 语句的查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: To promote consistency among .NET Framework data providers, name the inheriting class in the form <paramref name="PrvClassname" /> where <paramref name="Prv" /> is the uniform prefix given to all classes in a specific .NET Framework data provider namespace.
trans-unit.target: 若要提升.NET Framework 数据提供程序之间的一致性，将窗体中的继承类<paramref name="PrvClassname" />其中<paramref name="Prv" />是为特定的.NET Framework 数据提供程序命名空间中的所有类提供的统一前缀。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="Sql" /> is the prefix of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> class in the <see langword="System.Data.SqlClient" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<paramref name="Sql" />的前缀<see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" />类<see langword="System.Data.SqlClient" />命名空间。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbConnection" /> interface, you should implement the following constructors:
trans-unit.target: 继承自<see cref="T:System.Data.IDbConnection" />接口，则应实现以下构造函数：

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Item
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 项

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> PrvConnection()
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> PrvConnection()

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Initializes a new instance of the PrvConnection class.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 初始化 PrvConnection 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> PrvConnection(string connectionString)
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> PrvConnection (字符串 connectionString)

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Initializes a new instance of the PrvConnection class when given a string containing the connection string.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 初始化 PrvConnection 类在给定包含连接字符串的字符串的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Begins a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 开始一项数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: Begins a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 开始一项数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示新事务的对象。

trans-unit.source: Once the transaction has completed, you must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction by using the <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 完成事务后，必须显式提交或回滚该事务使用<xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Commit%2A>或<xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Begins a database transaction with the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> 值开始数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示新事务的对象。

trans-unit.source: Once the transaction has completed, you must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 完成事务后，必须显式提交或回滚事务使用<xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Commit%2A>或<xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the database to use in place of the current database.
trans-unit.target: 要代替当前数据库使用的数据库名称。

trans-unit.source: Changes the current database for an open <see langword="Connection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 更改已打开的 <see langword="Connection" /> 对象的当前数据库。

trans-unit.source: Closes the connection to the database.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与数据库之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.Close%2A> method rolls back any pending transactions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.Close%2A>方法回滚任何挂起的事务。

trans-unit.source: It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将释放到连接池，连接或关闭的连接，如果禁用连接池。

trans-unit.source: An application can call `Close` more than one time without generating an exception.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以调用`Close`不止一次，而不会生成异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string used to open a database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于打数据库的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing connection settings.
trans-unit.target: 包含连接设置的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The `ConnectionString` property can be set only while the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: `ConnectionString`仅当连接关闭时，才可以设置属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of a derived class, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>, sets its <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>, and displays its <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.State%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建派生类的实例<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>，设置其<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>，并显示其<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.State%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time to wait while trying to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.
trans-unit.target: 获取终止尝试并生成错误之前在尝试建立连接时所等待的时间。

trans-unit.source: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.
trans-unit.target: 等待连接打开所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 15 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 15 秒。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates no limit to the wait time, rather than no wait time, and should be avoided in a <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.ConnectionString%2A> because it would cause the connection attempt to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0 表示没有限制的等待时间，而不是没有等待时间，，应当避免在<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>因为它可能会导致连接尝试，表示无限期等待。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Command object associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个与连接关联的命令对象。

trans-unit.source: A Command object associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: 与连接关联的命令对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current database or the database to be used after a connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used once a connection is open.
trans-unit.target: 当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The `Database` property can be dynamically updated by using the <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A> method or by passing an SQL statement using one of the Execute methods.
trans-unit.target: `Database`属性可以通过使用动态更新<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A>方法或通过使用 Execute 方法之一的 SQL 语句。

trans-unit.source: (Initially the database is set by means of the connection string.) If you change the current database using an SQL statement or the `ChangeDatabase` method, an informational message is sent and then the property is updated.
trans-unit.target: （最初数据库设置通过连接字符串。）如果你更改当前数据库使用 SQL 语句或`ChangeDatabase`方法发送一条信息性消息，然后更新的属性。

trans-unit.source: Opens a database connection with the settings specified by the <see langword="ConnectionString" /> property of the provider-specific Connection object.
trans-unit.target: 打开具有指定设置（由特定于提供程序的 Connection 对象的 <see langword="ConnectionString" /> 属性所指定）的数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取连接的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.ConnectionState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.ConnectionState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The allowed state changes are:
trans-unit.target: 允许的状态更改是：

trans-unit.source: From `Closed` to `Open`, using the `Open` method of the Connection object.
trans-unit.target: 从`Closed`到`Open`，使用`Open`连接对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: From `Open` to `Closed`, using either the `Close` method or the `Dispose` method of the Connection object.
trans-unit.target: 从`Open`到`Closed`，使用`Close`方法或`Dispose`连接对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of a derived class, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>, sets its <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>, and displays its <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.State%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建派生类的实例<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>，设置其<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>，并显示其<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.State%2A>。
